name: Future Pinball

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars Jedi Knight - Dark Forces 2/JK.EXE

content:
files:
- fpb: http://members.iinet.net.au/~cleathley/downloads/FuturePinballSetup_v1.9.1.20101231.exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars Jedi Knight - Dark Forces 2/JK.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: fbp
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: wsh57
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: oleauth32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
